column5: Try Buena Vista Resort on Lake of the Woods. The web site is - buenavistaresort.com - Take a look at the daily fishing journal
we are looking for a good lodge to fish for walleye and pike. we would like a drive in lodge and bring own boat. we can not find that right lodge yet. help if you can thanks bob
What area are you wanting to go to??

Forget the fish and hunt ontario place. The owner looks like a dick and they only accept cash as payment.I see no rate listed that just includes a cabin when you want to bring your own boat so forget those loosers.What area do you want to go to? I have been everywhere in Ontario so maybe I can help you out on your area of choice.
http://www.pickerelarm.com/Best place in nw ontario. Hardest to get into though. 99% repeat custermers (like me).
Ontario is a big province. Can you be a little more specific as to what area you like to travel to? A trip to Lac Suel is always worthwhile. TGG
Take a look at the ENGLISH RIVER.Lots of water many places to go to.Look at the lodges around KENORA.
Hi Bob-I have a 3 bedroom cottage on Rainy lake on an island very close to the mainland.Rainy offers great walleye and northern fishing not to mention bass- [email protected] for pics and info
